description: This file defines a Flutter UI screen, `HistoryScreen`, which displays a list of call history entries. It interacts with a provider (`HistoryProvider`) to fetch and display historical call data, and allows redialing by navigating to a call route.

classes.name: HistoryScreen
classes.description: A Flutter StatefulWidget that displays call history entries and handles redial actions.

classes.name: _HistoryScreenState
classes.description: State class managing initialization and building the UI for HistoryScreen.

methods.name: initState
methods.description: Initializes the state, triggering a refresh of call history data upon component mount.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the UI, which shows a list of historical call entries with options to redial.
